Package jrtr

Interface RenderContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLRenderContext, SWRenderContext
    public interface RenderContext
    Declares the functionality of a render context, or a "renderer". It is currently implemented by GLRenderContext and SWRenderContext.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Shader makeShader()
      Make a shader.
      Texture makeTexture()
      Make a texture.
      VertexData makeVertexData​(int n)
      Make a vertex data sturcture.
      void setSceneManager​(SceneManagerInterface sceneManager)
      Set a scene manager that will be rendered.
      void useDefaultShader()
      Use the default shader.
      void useShader​(Shader s)
      Use a shader.
